pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fair Adjusted Selective Inference // The Fair Adjusted Selective Inference (FASI) procedure as described in the paper "A Fairness-Adjusted Selective Inference Framework For Classification" By: Bradley Rava, Wen Sun, Gareth James and Xin Tong (2021). The package includes a function that preforms the FASI procedure and returns both the r-scores and classification for new observations.
